QuestData.Title: SCRAP-E
QuestData.Description: This card allows the user to access the control panel of the scrapbot designated SCRAP-E, in order to perform maintenance and reprogram the bot's directives.$B$BSCRAP-E appears to be assigned to the interior of the building at The Inventor's Library. The card displays a list of the bot's broken components and failing systems. With the proper parts, the bot can be restored to working condition.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the SCRAP-E Access Card along with 4 Handfuls of Cobalt Bolts and 5 Overcharged Capacitors to SCRAP-E at The Inventor's Library.
QuestData.RewardText: <You begin performing the repairs indicated by the access card. When the repairs are complete, you close the access panel and throw the power switch.>
